程序包的使用
org.apache.jasper.compiler

  • 使用org.apache.jasper.compiler的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.jasper  
    org.apache.jasper.compiler  
    org.apache.jasper.servlet  
    org.apache.jasper.xmlparser  
  • org.apache.jasper使用的org.apache.jasper.compiler中的类 
    类和说明
    Compiler
    Main JSP compiler class.
    JarResource 
    JspConfig
    Handles the jsp-config element in WEB_INF/web.xml.
    JspRuntimeContext
    Class for tracking JSP compile time file dependencies when the &060;%@include file="..."%&062; directive is used.
    ServletWriter
    This is what is used to generate servlets.
    TagPluginManager
    Manages tag plugin optimizations.
    TldLocation 
    TldLocationsCache
    A container for all tag libraries that are defined "globally" for the web application.
  • org.apache.jasper.compiler使用的org.apache.jasper.compiler中的类 
    类和说明
    AntCompiler.JasperAntLogger 
    Compiler
    Main JSP compiler class.
    ELInterpreter
    Defines the interface for the expression language interpreter.
    ErrorDispatcher
    Class responsible for dispatching JSP parse and javac compilation errors to the configured error handler.
    JarResource 
    JavacErrorDetail
    Class providing details about a javac compilation error.
    JspConfig.JspProperty 
    JspUtil.ValidAttribute 
    SmapStratum
    Represents the line and file mappings associated with a JSR-045 "stratum".
    TldLocation 
    TldLocationsCache
    A container for all tag libraries that are defined "globally" for the web application.
  • org.apache.jasper.servlet使用的org.apache.jasper.compiler中的类 
    类和说明
    JarResource 
    JspRuntimeContext
    Class for tracking JSP compile time file dependencies when the &060;%@include file="..."%&062; directive is used.
  • org.apache.jasper.xmlparser使用的org.apache.jasper.compiler中的类 
    类和说明
    ErrorDispatcher
    Class responsible for dispatching JSP parse and javac compilation errors to the configured error handler.
